product_overview: A modern social media platform for posting, interacting, and discovering content through a personalized feed, user profiles, and rich social interactions leveraging React and Next.js.
core_goals: Provide a seamless user experience for creating and consuming posts with rich media support.
Enable robust social interactions such as liking, commenting, following, and sharing within the platform.
Ensure reliable and performant data loading and state management using efficient React libraries and APIs.
Offer comprehensive user authentication and onboarding for secure access and personalized content.
Support content discovery through explore and discover pages to increase user engagement.
Maintain content integrity and usability by supporting post editing, deletion, and rich text editing features.
key_features: Feed Post Card component with media display, likes, comments, edit/delete/share modals, and interaction panels.
Create Post modal supporting text and media uploads with a rich text editor.
Sidebar navigation and user suggestion components to enhance engagement.
Profile sections including customizable headers and tabbed content views (posts, likes, etc).
Rich Text Editor integration based on TipTap for posts and comments.
Authentication management with Zustand store and secured query/toast providers.
API client built with Axios for backend communication.
Marketing and static content pages including pricing, blog, roadmap, terms, and privacy.
State-of-the-art UI with Next.js 16, React 19, and Tailwind CSS styling.
user_flow_summary: User onboarding with authentication steps: login, signup, email verification, and password recovery.
Browsing the personalized feed, liking/unliking posts and comments, and posting new content.
Interacting with other users through following/unfollowing and viewing user suggestions.
Using the explore and discover pages to browse new content and navigate through tags and profiles.
Editing and deleting posts through modal interfaces with immediate UI updates.
Accessing user profiles with tabs showing posts, likes, and other social metrics.
Participating in comment threads with rich text support and the ability to reply to comments.
Consuming static marketing and informational pages with seamless navigation.
validation_criteria: Likes/unlikes update UI instantly and reflect accurate counts without errors.
Comments can be successfully posted, replied to, and liked, with appropriate validation messages for errors.
Follow/unfollow actions perform optimistic updates with rollback on failure and display error notifications.
Edit and delete post functionalities open modals, perform updates, and invalidate caches correctly.
Media playback controls (play, pause, mute, unmute) function correctly with visible status.
Authentication flows (login, signup, verify email, forgot password) redirect and guard routes properly.
Explore and discover pages render content accurately and handle pagination or infinite scroll seamlessly.
Static content pages load correctly with working links and proper content display.
Automated end-to-end tests cover critical paths including feed interactions, authentication, and profile navigation to ensure stability.
